item.description:
Paganfest America Part II

KORPIKLAANI, ELUVEITIE, PRIMORDIAL, MOONSORROW, BLACKGUARD, SWASHBUCKLE

Doors Open at: 7:00 PM
Show Starts at: 8:00 PM
Tickets $30.00

This appears to be a viking metal show which is awesome to watch. Unfortunately, Diane and I will be unable to make it due to illness (not swine flu, I don't think). Sorry for the late bail on our part, we were hoping to be able to make it but it just won't work. We encourage anyone else who's going and would like to meet up to coordinate on here.
item.how_to_find_us: Sorry, we can't make it; please coordinate amongst yourselves.
item.name: 5/1 - Paganfest America Part II @ Palladium
